text: Worst service ever!! Came here a couple nights ago and we had to literally wave down the bartenders to serve us after sitting at the bar and being ignored for 15 minutes. We would finish our drinks and then have to do it again. There were only about 5 other people there at the time, but we were the only 2 not gambling, which is most likely why we got ignored. The bartenders need to learn some manners and customer service. Lost 2 customers that night

Horrible customer service from bartenders, Amber & Lacey. Not sure which was the blonde one but she was the worst. Bar ran out of their promoted special "Pendleton" for 10:00 games this Sunday so when we asked for another whiskey for the special price they basically said sorry you won a $25 gift card during our raffle which should more than cover the extra cost on regular prices (our friends won the gc). Then she says you're lucky we even gave you raffle tickets because they're only for Steelers fans. Very poor service. They're pool cues are horrible as well. Will never come back.
Came with my service animal. Employees made me prove he was a service animal before I could even place a food order.

Love this place close to home bartenders and waitresses awesome always make you feel at home since I moved here couple weeks ago. Only encountered 1 shitty battened it was night shift and he didn't seem to care took his breaks at the bar and super slow! As for the women they all rock! Thanks for letting me find my new home out here

Service × hit and miss *one loud bartender and an annoying asian server that literally cackles super loud when talking with a customer, every 2 seconds. It hurts my ear and it is so crazy,  she doesn't think other customers exist.  I have left early because of her. 
Bartenders × hit and miss
Food × okay 
Frequency × used to go once a week because of convenience but stopped wasting money.

That's it.
Great place for good food and drinks. Decent afternoon and late might happy hours.  Friendly and comfortable. Must be over 21.

Lousy bartenders, they are too busy chit chatting among themselves to take care of patrons. I waited 25 minutes for a bill and another 20 minutes for them to take payment. Unbelievable!! And I gambled a shit ton of money. Food tasted good though.

I live in the area of Timbers on Novat so I've been there quite a few times. Staff were always nice but the service for food was not very good even though the food was good. I recently went there for lunch and received GREAT service from Krystal. She was friendly, was quick to come to the table when we sat down and was very attentive.  They are under new management and have made some positive changes.

Service is typically slow. Table waitresses are always slow. Was thinking it was just one, but it's the system. And what part of "no pickle" do they not understand. 3 times, increasingly insistent that there be no pickle and alas, they bring a pickle.

This is the only Timbers I'll go to. We used to live near by and came in often. Now unfortunately not so much recently. But the staff STILL treats us like family , Ever. Time. Our orders always right no matter if we get the same thing or try something new. If you ever need a good cocktail after a long day, have a redwood. It's outstanding. Overall I love it here. It's my home away from home. Keep it up guys!!=)

We had a nice dinner and a few drinks.  The food was good and Steffi, our waitress, was great.  One of the patrons, (a regular, I think,) was way out of control, and nearly caused an unpleasant confrontation with us.  Management stepped in and did the right thing by us, so we have to applaud them for that.

I've been gone since February and I just got back into town right now my first stop is right here at Timbers so I can see Jamie and have a beer with her.  I missed timbers and  her so much and how happy she is and she welcomed me just like I was part of the family and never left I'm never leaving this place everyone's got to come down here and check out Jamies smile.

Solid 3.5.  Great American bar food and top notch locals bar drinks.  Service was excellent and waitress did a great job on a steelers game day.  The Bozeman beef dip is really great and the best I've had at the locals bar type eateries (Steiners etc.).   Great place to watch a game, have a drink with friends or have some bar food appetizers.  Reasonably priced.

Well, where do I start? I rec'd a coupon in my mailbox thought would give it a try since we are always open to try new as we have not lived here long. Was  I surprised! The hostess/server  was pleasant when I walked in and greeted me. I sat down at the bar as I called in take out. The bartender was extremely pleasant and asked me if I would care for a drink while I waited for my order. 

As I called it in, I was told it would be about 10 minutes. I live around the corner and was promptly on time. 

The food was soggy and cold; the fries were so OVER SALTED they couldn't be eaten. My fish as well was so soggy that I couldn't pick it up, it fell apart, had to eat with a fork. The onion rings were so cold and the fries as well, they must have not been made to order.  The food looks nothing as they show it on their online menu. 

However, what takes the cake is when I sat down at the bar to wait, a waitress / server behind the bar who was not busy, was using very potty mouth language. There was a patron at the bar playing poker, and a couple sitting down having a drink. I'm not a PRUDE and have been around the block a few times,  but I was offended at her choice of language talking to the bartender with customers present. 

I know for a fact, I will be throwing away my coupons and will NOT revisit this establishment. I am shocked as hell that they were voted Las Vegas best bar food. Who is doing this rating? A new place to try? Think again, go elsewhere. It's not worth the paper they paid to print the coupon. Manager or owner, take these yelp replies VERY SERIOUSLY! Service like this is honky tonk.
Well done Robert!! We stopped by Friday night, He took very good care of us at the bar! We will definitely be back!!!

We seriously just encountered the worst service of all time, our servers name was Erlinda and she literally brought the ticket at the time she brought the food. A few minutes later as we are eating, she asks us to pay the bill now so she can go home. I have no words for this service. If you have a choice, pick a different place to frequent.
Food is good, but not great. Service is acceptable with no complaints.  It's a local hangout and has a great atmosphere.

I have visited this establishment for approximately 7 years. I was a huge gamer, like their number 1 or 2 gamer. In the last year and several months you cannot win in this place. This place was my home away from home. I have gambled enough that I own every machine in this establishment. This establishment is a joke. You can go to any other timbers and  be treated with respect. Don't let me for get about The Edge of Town, Jason and their staff is absolutely amazing in every way. I will never go to Timbers Novat again, the place is not welcoming and unfortunately the staff is suffering because of the management.

A very nice place and the service was great ! Stopped in to have a drink with my Brother and they were just starting to get busy! 

Would definitely go back because of the atmosphere and service .

As a day walker..I have visited on several occasions sometimes seeking refuge from the hot desert sun with a cold frosty, other times using this location as a rally point.  The inside is comfortably lit and my fellow day walkers were a mellow crowd seeking fortune on the poker machines. 

The staff has always been friendly and the chow...equally friendly and tasty.

If your looking to chill during the day shift, this is a good place to do.  There is a lot of room for the other times of a twenty-four day for things to get hopping.

I am sure I will return again.

Worst bar ever . I ordered biscuits and gravy , biscuits and gravy was cold . I ordered beer and had to wait forever to get it so I ordered a bucket and I've been waiting for 15 minutes and waitress has told me twice its coming and last time she said they can't find buckets . I wanted to order bucket since it takes forever to get a drink but that was a waste of time . waitress bring one drink at a time so if u have a lot of people in ur party expect delays on ur drinks

First time stopping in and Amber made us want to come back, very friendly and accommodating. Food is great and good prices. We will definitely be back.

We have been coming here regularly and just love it. The bartenders (Amber, and Giggles) and servers (Gina) are amazing! Everyone there is so nice, food is excellent and managers are nice!

Ok - just left Timbers and so happy with our service from Clarissa, amazing bartender. Looking forward to more nights with her, Ambur our love and all the other amazing bartenders and servers at Timbers Novat!
Service was friendly and great. Best chicken tenders I've ever had in my life!! Great drinks!!!

I held off before writing this.. I love timbers food and always have. 1st trip to this timbers, I ordered fish and chips, takeout, went home 5 minute drive and tried to eat the worst fish I've ever had in my life.. I asked for it well done, it was not. It was nasty doughy breading which I peeled off to stale dry fish. Sorry guys but it was real bad.. 1 piece even had a hint of mold. Fast forward 2 months.. I thought I'd give it another try.. ordered the bacon burger to be safe... not too busy and it took a while for anyone to take our order. When we ordered and got our food my bacon was non existent. Asked the waitress if I had ordered bacon and she confirmed.. she apologized and insisted to bring me bacon, I declined but she still did. The bacon was way overdone and not any good. The burger was marginal and my wife ordered nachos which went in the trash. This timbers is not the place to go for food. I will drive the extra 5 minutes to the edge of town across the bridge.

1/2/16 update:

From Kathleen H (business manager)

Please send your contact information to Info@thglv.com. Someone from our Corporate Office would like to contact you about your experience. Thank you.

Apparently management was concerned so they sent me this... I responded, I used my email address as my contact info. I didn't send a phone number or address... 9 days later, NO RESPONSE.  Why even bother? I have now changed my rating to 1 star because of management's inability to manage.

To all the yelpers....

Thanks for reading!

I didn't want to like this place. After all, there are two dozen of them scattered across Vegas. 

But like it I did. Enough to go back. Enough to recommend it to my family while they were in town. Enough to think about popping in every time I want another beer, but am out at home. 

Thanks for surpassing my expectations

We recently moved to this side of town and this place is  really close to us.   The food was really good and the service was good as well.  I had the Steak Philly and it was loaded with onions and peppers just the way I like it.   Nice to know there is a friendly bar close to home.

Timbers on Novat is our stomping grounds! We come here pretty regularly. The staff are always so great to us. Liz and Steffi are our personal favorites! Always so nice and provide great service. The food is good as well. Timbers fries are the BEST!

They changed their Bloody Mary mix and I don't know why. It's not as good as the old mix, but oh well. 

They have a pool table, foosball and this place is very roomy. It would be more awesome if they had more games. Like a mini basketball hoop or darts.
I'm always coming here, love it. Long waits but the waitress is friendly and always hysterical with us. Never sent anything back due to wrong or under cooked food!
They never have Jim Beam, yet it is on their menu. This has happened several of times. So frustrating.

This place is definition of alright.  Not good but not bad either.  They have nice comfy seats.  The service is slow and spotty.  The food is alright.  I go here because my friends live right next to it and I can walk there.  Is it worth making a special trip for? Nope.

Timbers has new items on their already "full of options" menu. Ordered the Wedge salad, opted to have blue cheese dressing rather than the balsamic glaze, and what a crisp, flavorful blue cheese delight. The lettuce was perfectly chilled, and the bacon bits being plentiful made this salad, competition right up there with five star restaurants I've had the same at. I didn't have the opportunity to try the new desserts offered, but the Oreo sandwich and blondie toffee looked so delicious. Will definitely try on return visit. 

Have to give a shout out to Don, the Chef, the entire kitchen staff and the team, you've given us locals some wonderful changes that will meet our tummy requirements and allow us to enjoy ample offerings to meet our varying demands. Thanks for always being delicious!!!

Ok first off there is no reason why we get 75 dollars and 25 dollars in free points a week then we r given a tab!!! Omg the bartenders r doing their job and I get that but come on when u spend or used  to spend at least a grand a day!! 
and u go to a bar across freeway and get better treatment than u have ever had. That place (novatTimbers and management is a joke)! When are they gonna treat locals and neighborhood bar better than a stray??

Isn't this a sports bar?  
No specials for MNF, just the happy hour, which ends 90 minutes before the game ends. No big deal, unless you're marketing yourself as a Sportsbar - in which case honor the game and have a MNF, SNF, TNF special

Good food. Good drinks. Good prices. About as good as you can hope for from a local sports bar. This place feeds me at least once a week and I'm grateful they are only a block away from my house. The staff is amazing too. Actually, probably the best part. Amy is the coolest!!! She makes everything fun.

So I've been here once before and it was great but wow my second time was the complete opposite! I ordered enchilada nachos to go over the phone with no meat, my only restriction. Upon picking them up and getting home I realized they forgot cheese completely. No cheese what's so ever was on my nachos wow. I called and what surprised me was they only offered for me to come pick up cheese on the side. No refund nothing, not even a sorry. So to be honest the service had my decide to refund and go else where. I work in the service industry so I'm not just complaining to complain this was horrible service.

My second time here today. First off I love that there's a place I can watch my Steelers! Even though it was only my second time here the bartenders remembered my food and drink order from last time which makes you feel special. Lacy and Amber are awesome and make the atmosphere really fun. The food is good and the drinks are on point, I have a new home on sundays now! Thanks for providing a great customer service experience guys!
Burgers are okay -tacos & hot salsas were great. Quick service & incredibly comfy chairs! All in all we plan on coming back here again. :)
We go into Timbers from time to time for a late night night cap or a lite snack bc we missed dinner. The atmosphere is comfy and Ashley who is the bartender is amazing!

Love coming here after a long day at work. The waitresses are always so friendly and the food is always hot. The place can be filled of cigarette smoke if a lot of people are at the bar smoking. But normally it isn't too bad.

UPDATED REVIEW
The general manager came in contact with me and is taking care of this personally and keeping me updated along the way. Definitely will be back, thank you again Cliff!!



I loved this place. Great food, game specials, and our service at the time was great but my boyfriend and I were there last week and I went to look at my bank account and I got charged almost double of our check. I called twice and each time they took my information and said the manager would call me back. No one called me back and it's been a day and a half. I'm just disappointed because I wanted this to get resolved but no one has contacted me about this overcharge so I had to dispute it with my bank and get it resolved that way.
Clean and open layout. Great selection of food that you don't have to wait forever for. Decent selection of beers on tap. Stop by and enjoy yourself, you won't regret it.

I have been here a few times for dinner and happy hour when my bf had groupon for this place.

This location has usually been more on the quiet side, and has very comfortable seating with spacious tables for plenty of food and drinks.

Their Happy hour runs from 4pm-7pm and then 12am -4am. For drinks, my bf usually get Mai Tai and it was strong and tasty.

We had tried their Chicken Wings and Fries, Utimate Grilled Cheese and Beer- Battered Fish and Chips. They were not bad, not great, just ok. However, I recommend Bozeman Beef Dip. The beef is slow roasted, tender and delicious, and complemented by sauteed onions, melted provolone with just enough creamy horseradish. The roll is grilled and firm but great for dipping.

The service has always been on par. The waitresses check up on us just enough but not too much to see if water needed refill or if we needed anything.

Overall, the food is decent for a pub/bar and the prices are on the normal side.
Great location & friendly staff. Their chili is so good.  Loved the spinach dip.  Will definitely be going back.

I have been coming to this Timbers for 5 yrs on just about every Wednesday with my close confidants. However, on July 8th 2015 at 8:50pm, while waiting on my friends to arrive, as we trend on arriving at 9pm, I wasn't greeted, like they usually do, ( normally serviced by Steffi, who is AMAZING AND CREATES A WONDERFUL ATMOSPHERE) ... I say down and Server (ABRANDON - what it said on my ticket just in case she lied she was a heavier set middle aged woman with black chopsticks in her hair just in case she rang the ticket under someone else's name) finally acknowledged me and asked me if I wanted something to drink. I stated if I can get some water, and I'll decide on anything  else once they arrive. It took 10mins to get a GLASS OF WATER. Server was more focused on her friends that were here then getting something so simply. Further, when my friends arrived she took our orders, and my brother asked if we can get separate tickets in advanced, she responded " it's a pain in the butt and I already rang it under one ticket!" My brother then asked is it really hard ... We can't split the ticket, she said , " No!" My best friend asked her if she was ok, and she then proceeded to tell our entire table  something under her breathe and as she walked away we all heard her say " high-strung!" She then went to the table next to us and clearly venting about us, after we simply asked an easy question. I WANTED TO LEAVE, but my brother and friends wanted to stay because we already ordered our food, which we enjoy eating here. I WILL NEVER COME HERE AGAIN ON A WEDNESDAY, unless Steffi is here. I had a long day and simply wanted to unwind. I did not deserve to be treated any kind of way by a professional is in the serving business. CUSTOMER SERVICE AND KNOWING HOW TO TREAT PEOPLE IS A MUST! You have to be a people person... FOOD FOR THOUGHT!

I've been a regular at this place for a few years now. The food, service and drinks never disappoint. The ambience is perfectly lit and unobtrusive, the oversized chairs comfortable and inviting. The bar isn't in a dense part of town which means it's rare for it to be overly-busy, which is a huge plus for me. Compared to other bars around the valley, this place gets a well-deserved extra notch for its servers. Steffi and Chrya, the 2 servers I deal with regularly, are always attentive, extremely nice, and quick to attend to our needs. In the few years I've been going here, the service has always been top-notch. I live in Henderson but make the extra drive just to come here whenever I need to relax. This particular Timbers location earns the spot as the go-to bar at top of my list.

Frankly, wouldn't even give them one star. We've tried to eat here twice and not once did a waitress get our attention. They just chat with each other and ignore the customers. No wonder they don't have any patrons.

First off this is a Steelers bar, and I am not a Steelers fan. I come here every Sunday to watch my teams game. The bartenders Ambur and Lacy have always been the most accommodating and put my teams game on for me. They have the best service, are extremely friendly, and really take care of you. Ambur makes an amazing Bloody Mary that has brought me back from the dead several times. If you're looking for a local bar with great bartenders this is the one! Be sure to thank Ambur and Lacy for being so awesome!!!
I used to come here 7 days a week because I'm an alcoholic,  but since management  changed the bartenders attire from leggings to shorts,  I only come here 5 nights a week.

Ok so it's a bar. In Vegas. A chain bar. 
I'm more of a one off mom and pop unique place type of person.  This place is super close to home for me so I went. 
They have one pool table. It's usually not packed crowded. Good service. 
The food is actually really good. They have two different kinds of homemade excellent salsa. Have the tacos!!  The burgers are good. They ask you how you want it cooked (and are OK with medium rare being an option) and actually cook it as you requested. 
Everything I've had there is really good. Just a little smokey but it's a bar. You kinda expect it. I'd rather go without dealing with that but I live in Vegas.   I get it. Can't ding them for that here.

I absolutely love this Timbers. Great atmosphere, food is always on point and the staff is amazing. Jamie takes great care of me and is a big reason I come in so often. They've hired quite a few new people lately that I'm sure are great but she's the best. Liz and Steph are also awesome. Any negative reviews on them are from people who wine and cry about any little thing. I highly recommend this place to everyone!!!

We tried this spot on a Friday evening for a late night bite to eat with a beverage. But we only had one drink and left. By far the worst services I've ever experienced at a bar. The lady that greeted us was kind enough to let's is know their waitress called out sick and asked us to sit at the bar because her shift was ending. If I didn't already order my drink I would have left. We got to the bar and the 3 bartenders were to busy chatting amoungst theirselves and couldn't take our order. Realizing they were just being lazy to walk 2ft behind the bar to serve us was upsetting because their were less then 10 people in the bar and the other 8 seemed to be regulars. We will never go to Timbers again!!!!

1st time in and have no complaints! We had 2 waitresses taking great care of us. Wings were good and so was the grilled cheese. Comfy chairs and TVs everywhere. I only gave 4 stars because it was smokey in here.

Ok so I went to two  timbers close to my house I will never go back they don't comp drinks and I had to pay over 50 for spending 100 in play I have gone to The Edge which is right next door but thought I would give the 2nd timbers the chance to redeem themselves  but they let me down again and I will NOT be back The Edge had my vote hands done and timbers will no longer have my business I have been in town for over 47yrs and never have I ever been treated like this by any bar really sad since they are close to my house but that is fine I have other bars that cherish my patronize so long timbers

Food was good. Service sucked. You had to wait forever to get a waitress to your table. Then she forgets what you asked for so you have to wait again. Asked for the check and that took forever. Finally came back and I paid right away but she didn't give me a pen to sign my name so more waiting. Needless to say, I didn't tip at all and I was very dissatisfied.

This is now my 2nd time. Honestly my first time, was 5 stars. The food was so good! The service was excelIent, the wait was on time. I didn't have a chance to write a review last week but now I do. I ordered take out last Sunday, and I was so happy that I wanted to order take out from here again this week for my family. I was so happy with their onion rings that I was craving it. So the first thing that I didn't like is that I was told my food would be ready in 25 minutes. It took 45 minutes. Even if people were dining it, that wait is way too long. For my burger I wanted, onion rings on the side. To my dismay it was fries. My daughter wanted buffalo wings, I wanted medium. To my disappointment, it was labeled Hot and it was even written "hot" on the container. My 11 year old could only eat 3 of the 6 wings. I also asked for extra ranch on the side...didn't get that either. There is nothing like leaving the comfort of your home to pick up food, only to get home and see not one, but several things wrong with your order. 

Last week it was completely different people working. I do not know if it had anything to do with that. Despite it all, I still love the food and will keep going.
$.35 chicken wings on Wednesday!  $5.00 breakfast specials before 6AM

Live right by this bar. The food is always above average for bar food. Chicken fingers are great and the ranch sauce is amazing. For some reason this place has the best ranch sauce I've  ever had. Also, the breakfast is good

It's better than average bar food.. but still bar food none the less. I've felt myself compelled to come here and then couldn't find anything appetizing while perusing the menu.

This location is nicer than the one just down the road, more open, feels cleaner. The bartenders here range from really nice to just getting the job done. Jenna is always very friendly, and Sunny is.. efficient. 

Late night specials run Mon-Fri 12am-6am. For $5 you can get a cheeseburger with fries. It's a pretty solid burger. They also have a breakfast special which comes with two hotcakes, two eggs, hashbrowns and your choice of sausage or bacon (the bacon is killer!)

Good for late nights, but that's the only time I come here.

We don't go to bars just to drink and gamble. We go for the bar food. This Timbers location has not only the BEST bar food... but the BEST FOOD of any Timbers location I have EVER been to (5)!! Hands down!! Kenny, the graveyard bartender, is AWESOME! We love him so much that we don't go in if he isn't working. That is not to say that the rest of the staff isn't wonderful, it's just the hours we work. Pete, the cook, is ABSOLUTELY THE BEST! If I showed you side by side pictures of his food, and the same thing from another location...you would NEVER go to another location. THAT'S how good he is. We found this place when we moved into the neighborhood two years ago, and have been regulars ever since. We live down the street from another Timbers now, but still make the drive every week to get to this one. If you don't live close, make the haul. I promise is worth it!! From midnight on, Thursday to Tuesday. Thank you guys so much! We love you!!
I personally prefer Timbers more than PTS... laid back atmosphere, they usually have beer specials .. good place to gamble and play some pool.
Timbers ! Timbers ! Timbers ! My go to place for some BBQ honey garlic chicken ! Deliciouso ! Since it's right up the street from my house
I think you have to be part of the "cliche" at this bar to get their best service.   I go to the one down the street and they treat new customers better and don't have attitude for non-gamers.
I am at timbers for breakfast and the food is awesome but it pales in comparison to the service we are being provided from Elisabeth. Thank you thank you thank you.

This bar is awesome. I love there 4 to 7 p.m. happy hour will you get two for one drinks the drinks are very reasonable and very good. Me and my girlfriend usually go on a Friday to have drinks after work which is very good and relaxing for us help to get rid of all those weekday problems that you've had all week.

I usually get something simple like a whiskey and coke which for 2 for 1 is 2 for $3.50 which you can't find anywhere besides maybe Fremont Street for even one for $3.50. They have great beer specials as well when I do drink beer I use he can get one of those as well and their two for one that's also. My girlfriend likes to get the margaritas which come in a highball glass and they are $4.50. One thing I will say is that the bartenders are awesome they like to talk I like to be interactive and they like to make you feel like you are family which is a great thing for a bar because then you feel like you want to come back and you want to interact with them as well.

I did notice that they have gotten a new cuz I don't know if the cook overnight is the same or if they have change that I do have one problem the last time I went late at night the bartender had to end up helping the cook get our food out quick cuz it took so long and when it did come it wasn't good and it looks like the bartender had actually gone back and cook the food himself because the cook that was back I didn't know what he was doing that was a very late night for us around 4 a.m. so I have not been back that late to see if the Cook has changed but as far as the one that's there during the happy hour he is pretty good and haven't had any problems since I do only go during the four to seven happy hour.

I have been going to this location for over 5 years...never again. I went in to the dirtiest bar I have ever seen today. I had to ask the bartender Melissa for a rag to wipe down. She gave me attitude..there was spit on the leather part, dirty ashtrays, which she dumped but didn't wipe out, and sticky, dirty glasses. I asked her for the rag myself and she would give it to me...she then went over the jets and actually caused me to play a hand I didn't want too. I tried another machine, other end of bar....the previous person had left and again...nothing cleaned. I left! I wish the health department would go take a look!

This was my first time inside a Timbers. We are new to the neighborhood and were looking for somewhere to eat. We walked in and stood at the entryway for about a minute, then we figured out that we're supposed to seat ourselves. A sign would have been nice or one of the waitresses telling us to seat ourselves would have been nice. We picked a table and sat there for approximately 5 minutes before a waitress acknowledged us and told us that she would be with us in a minute. During that time we looked at the menus, that I had to retrieve from other tables. The menu items were appealing and I really would have liked to have ordered something. However the ventilation in this place is horrible and the cigarette smoke was too much for me. Additionally, the music was so loud that I couldn't even have a conversation with my boyfriend. We got up and left without even ordering anything. So, this rating is based on the atmosphere and of the inattentiveness of the staff. I don't know if all Timbers are this way but I'm not sure that I'm willing to give another location a chance based on this.

Went in the other night and really enjoyed my visit. The bartenders were very friendly and greeted me as soon as I sat down. They were both very attentive. I ordered some food to take home. The mushroom Swiss burger was really good. The chicken philly was a little lack luster but it tasted ok. The cheese was just on half of the sandwich and it could have really used some kind of sauce like mayo on it. 
I'll definitely be going back again just probably won't be ordering the chicken philly again.

I went for lunch and the food was good I got the mini sliders, which was more than enough food. Our waitress was on it. I also love that they have these huge comfy chairs to sit in. I gave only 4 stars because my tummy felt like crap after, too much grease I think but really it was a great vibe, service and time. I'll be back when I want some bar food.

I just stopped by this place with my wife and a few friends to hang out and we were treated SO well! Our waitress Stephie was very friendly and attentive. Food and drinks came quickly and the table cleared in a timely manner after. As long as Stephie is working here, I will always come back. Great service!!
Great Steeler bar with good food!
Timbers is still one of my local bar food favs..You can always get good BBQ wings or grilled cheese to settle that urge for bar food. Try the Hot BBQ wings with blue chees is deelish!!
A laid back place to relax and have a drink and be with friends. It's 24 hours and there is pool and the kitchen never closes either.

I hadn't been here in a few years, but I popped in yesterday! Melissa was fun and energetic. She did her job very well and moved with purpose. It's difficult to please everyone, however everyone there was having a blast! She's an asset to your company!
This place is awesome. It is a sports bar so the atmosphere is sporty. Staff is awesome and friendly. Food is delicious and extremely affordable. I'd recommend this place to anyone.

I love Timbers! I usually come every Wednesday with my friends. Steffi is the best!! It's been about 2 years that she's taken care of us and it's just not the same when she's not there. She's more than a server, she's become a friend!!

Still in here, both me and my friend gambled, $20 on machines, had 3 wines each. 
Got the bill, were charged for all of the drinks full price. Reminded bartender GLENN that we were gambling. He went to the computers checked smth for 10 min. Came back and said "according to my machine you didn't play anything" , the said that we both need to LOOSE $20 to get comped drinks. Its not my first time being here,never had situations like that. Plus its my birthday. MANAGERS LOOK WHO YOU HIRE

My friend and I stopped in here to do some gambling and some drinking. Tonight this was the worst I've ever seen this place. 

The new bartender Robert was decent enough. He actually did his job. The other two bartenders whose name I don't know but one is old with big knockers, the other younger, tattooed up....well both of them should be fired for bad service. I waited almost 20 minutes to get my 3rd drink, then they had the audacity to charge me for it along with 2 beers for my friend, even though we had put in plenty of money to cover the drinks. When I complained about being charged, after getting 3 drinks based on $60 gambled to the new bartender Robert, he asked the "senior" bartender and she didn't even have the decency to come over herself, just kept talking to some local customers like she had been doing all night while not doing her job. 

I used to like this place and came here often. Not anymore. Not ever again. Treat your customers badly, and you will lose business. F Timbers!

There are about two Timbers close to each other off W Cheyenne, but this one is a newer one and the inside is dark, was a little smoky but it was over-powering while we ate. It was rather empty inside but it seems to have to have a good atmosphere inside, your typical bar scene, but make they have some really comfy chairs to see in at the tables. Its a nice place to have a happy hour get together. The food was good I got the chicken strips and man they give you enough to fill you up. I want to go back to try more food, we were there they had a turkey special because it was around Thanksgiving, but it seems like a good place for friends to hang out! Will have to try the other location and see if they are about the same.

Been going to this place pretty consistently for about 5 years. Jaime, Cassy, Amber, Sunny, and Erlinda are rock stars! Very professional and extremely accommodating. I've put a lot of money in the machines over the years and I would guess I've broke even, or I might be down a bit but I have no regrets. Timbers is an awesome neighborhood bar. 

The food is awesome, especially the wings!! There have been a lot of late night runs to grab food for me. They're open 24/7/365, so I've never had worry about making it it on time.

Anytime is the right time. :D

First time at this location... end of night, wanted to eat a little and maybe win ( don't we all ) 
Ordered the sliders with Steve, asked for no onions, no lettuce, no tomatoes...
Guess what! Comes with it all and completely ignores the fact it did. Yes I accepted it as I don't like to waste food... knocked the crap off I didn't want and still had all the onions all up in the cheese.
Not once were we asked how are meal was as he was too busy talking gossip with some local girl. Which he stilllllllll is! 
Finally comes to collect our dishes and then has the heart to ask how was everything..: I told him thanks besides all the things I ask you not to have on it it was decent. 
I've worked in hospitality for years and you know when you have met someone that has no idea about customer service... today was one of those days... I'll stick to Timbers on Stephanie to play and see the people who treat and always go above and beyond!
